com.rift.coad.rdf.semantic.ontology
Interface OntologyClass

All Superinterfaces:
DataType
All Known Implementing Classes:
JenaOntologyClass
public interface OntologyClass
extends DataType

This interface defines the methods to manipulate the ontology.
